entry.title: My Home Server is REALLY Stupid and I Need to Fix It

media:group.media:title: My Home Server is REALLY Stupid and I Need to Fix It
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to KIOXIA for sponsoring this video! You can check out their CD8 Enterprise drives at: https://americas.kioxia.com/en-us/business/ssd/data-center-ssd.html?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=LinusTechTips&utm_campaign=data+center+ssds
Linus' old NAS is a hodgepodge of ancient drives, a very old CPU, and an extremely loud power supply. Also, it's actually 2 servers. Now it's finally time to replace them with awesome CD8 Enterprise drives from KIOXIA, a bunch of hard drives for even more storage, and a new power supply to quiet things down.
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1594436-my-home-server-is-really-stupid-and-i-need-to-fix-it/
Check out ServerPart Deals on eBay: https://ebay.us/m9hWB7 Buy a Seasonic TX-1600 1600W 80+ Titanium PSU: https://geni.us/KQ4I6th Buy a Noctua NF-F12 iPPC-2000 Fan: https://geni.us/LRpPt Buy a SlimSAS 8i to 2x Oculink 4i Cable on eBay: https://ebay.us/DuMtSS Buy a C-Payne PCIe Gen4 Host Adapter Card: https://lmg.gg/XQqeG Check out 45Drives: https://lmg.gg/CjKRz

entry.title: I made the World’s BRIGHTEST Gaming Monitor!

media:group.media:title: I made the World’s BRIGHTEST Gaming Monitor!
media:group.media:description:
Check out Acronis Cyber Protect for businesses at http://go.acronis.com/LTT
Checkout NexiGo’s Anniversary Sale at: https://www.nexigo.com/pages/1st-anniversary-sale
Sure, TVs and Monitors have gotten brighter, but NOT BRIGHT ENOUGH! That’s why we embarked on a journey to see how many NITs we can hit, how many lumens we can summon, and use HIGH POWER LEDS to make a display so painfully bright, we are putting ourselves at risk every time we use it. We were too concerned if we COULD make the brightest Monitor in History, that we forgot to ask if we SHOULD.
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1594298-i-made-the-brightest-gaming-monitor-in-the-world/
Buy a 4000K COB LED on AliExpress: ﻿https://s.click.aliexpress.com/e/_oDitjML﻿ ﻿Buy a MEANWELL 350W 36VDC 9.7A Enclosed Switching Power Supply: ﻿﻿https://lmg.gg/eVQl2 ﻿ ﻿Buy VIVOSUN Reflective Mylar Film Roll: ﻿https://geni.us/iVav Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

Sammy gets blocked. 1:45:06 Channels analytics, guessing game. 1:50:16 Text messages, history. 1:52:33 Best like-to-dislike ratio, past NCIX videos, good LTT videos. 1:56:32 How did you feel about 2024? 1:59:27 Topic #6: Fake Nintendo lawyer sending DMCA to YouTubers. 2:00:38 Topic #7: Nvidia contest winner disqualified without disclosure. 2:02:24 Topic #8: Arizona's school uses AI that teaches in two hours. 2:09:16 Topic #9: OpenAI's plan to shift to a for-profit structure. 2:10:15 ReBoot ReWind's GoFundMe. 2:11:13 Merch Messages #2 ft. entry.title: Is Buying a PETABYTE on Ebay Stupid?

media:group.media:title: Is Buying a PETABYTE on Ebay Stupid?
media:group.media:description:
Go to https://ground.news/ltt to get 50% off the Ground News Vantage plan. Outsmart algorithms and optimize the way you read the news.
Checkout MSI’s laptops deals at https://msi.gm/S621A5A8
With our quest to store all of the footage we’ve ever shot for our videos, we’re constantly in need of more storage. Unfortunately, storage is expensive, but when we found drives on eBay for nearly 50% off - we did what any sane folks would, and spent $10,000+ on them. Will we regret it?
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1592998-is-buying-a-petabyte-on-ebay-stupid/
Seagate’s full reply to our question about where recertified drives come from: “The drives come from a variety of sources and may become available to the refurbishment process for a range of reasons from commercial to technical. Drives are repaired and/or upgraded as appropriate, then re-tested to ensure they meet or exceed quality and performance requirements as per the relevant data sheet and will perform well for the term of the warranty.”
Check out TrueNAS Scale: https://www.truenas.com/truenas-scale/ Check out HexOS Early Access: https://hexos.com/#earlyaccess Check out OpenMediaVault: https://www.openmediavault.org/ Check out UNRAID: https://unraid.net/ Buy Seagate Exos X20 20TB SATA 3.5" Hard Drives from eBay (ServerPartDeals): ﻿https://ebay.us/phRQxA Buy a JONSBO N4 BLACK NAS Mini Chassis: ﻿https://geni.us/A06Wwh1 Buy a Dell OptiPlex 3050 Tower PC on eBay: ﻿https://ebay.us/90EQRT Buy an ASRock Rack ROMED8-2T Server Motherboard: ﻿https://geni.us/LOYPj Buy an NVIDIA Mellanox/ConnectX-6 100GbE Network Card: ﻿https://geni.us/Mi5gRD Buy a StarTech U.3 to PCIe Adapter Card: ﻿https://geni.us/cGo3M Buy a Noctua NF-A14 iPPC-3000 Fan: ﻿https://geni.us/6TiP Buy ﻿NetApp DS4246 Modular Disk Arrays on eBay: ﻿https://ebay.us/fMmVjX Buy KIOXIA CM6 Series 2.5" NVMe PCIe U.2 SSDs on eBay: ﻿https://ebay.us/OXuxTp
► GET OUR MERCH: https://lttstore.com ► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane ► GET A VPN: http://www.piavpn.com/linus ► SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS: https://lmg.gg/partners
Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
